topic.title: Response Destination Odometer Reading - conformance rules

lines.i: Odometer reading for the EMS vehicle at patient destination

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.173"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10639)/@code="67486-1" Counter or odometer reading NEMSIS --patient destination (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10640)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type PQ (CONF:10641)
NEMSIS Trace: EResponse.21 UCUM units SHOULD be "[mi_i]"
Contains exactly one [1..1] @classCode with data type ActClassObservation
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10639)/@code="67486-1" Counter or odometer reading NEMSIS --patient destination (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10640)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type PQ (CONF:10641)
NEMSIS Trace: EResponse.21 UCUM units SHOULD be "[mi_i]"
